## Short Read Sequencing

Modifying Brad's library protocal.

### Reagents needed
| reagent                    | order info                      | howmany/cost  
|----------------------------|---------------------------------|
|H2O                         |                                 |
|25 mM DNTPs                 | Thermo Scientific, Cat. # R1121 |
|End Repair enzyme & buffer  | NEB #E6050L                     |
|Taq Polymerase              |                                 |
|Ampure XP beads             | Beckman #A63881                 |      
|Strip magnet holder         | Already have                    |
|Universal Adaptors          |                                 |
|2X rapid T4 ligase & buffer | Enzymatics #L603-HC-L           |
|5X Phusion HF               | NEB #M0530S                     |
|Enrich S1 and S2 primers    | order?                          |
|10x PolI + buffer           | Thermo Scientific, Cat. # EP0041|
|MgCl2                       | Made fresh                      |

DNA isolation

  - make sure this works with D. mel. How many flies?  Quantify.
  - test a few and check if gDNA is intact on gel?
